text: George Hosato Takei Altman (born April 20, 1937 in Los Angeles, California) is an American actor. He is probably best known for playing Hikaru Sulu in the television series, Star Trek. His parents were of Japanese origin. In 2005, he said that he is homosexual during an interview with Frontiers magazine and that he was in a relationship with his partner of eighteen years, Brad Altman.George Takei and partner plan September wedding == References == Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:LGBT people from California Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American bloggers Category:Recipients of the Order of the Rising Sun
title: George Takei
